title: For some reason my discussion on LeaverBuster was removed.
body:
So here's another one.
LeaverBuster is flawed. 100%.
Look at all the discussions on it and realize that it needs to be removed.
It's completely random in the way it hands out punishments and their severity.
It knows no bounds, banning and restricting players for a single game left while people who leave every game they play get a free pass.
You don't even have to be reported to get a penalty. Even if you disconnect during champion select.
Riot, instead of implementing a faulty system that penalizes RANDOM players implement the thing we do need.
A TRIBUNAL.
If this discussion gets deleted such as my last one, I'll have no issue contacting support about this.

>>It's completely random

So are you telling me that Riot wrote a block of code similar to this?
-------------------------------
int playerIDToBan = rand() % sizeOfOceanicPlayerBase + 1;
player->setPlayer(playerIDToBan);
player->ban(REASON::LeaverBuster);
--------------------------------

Because if they did, I would be even more impressed than if you turned water into whine (See what I did there)

The Leaverbuster system doesn't just ban random people, or people who leave only once. I have been forced to leave, a couple of times and only gotten the warning, which everyone gets when they leave. That's the warning though, and its fair enough that everyone gets it on their first leave
it was a whine, not a discussion.
